favourite.article: I'm in love with the most beautiful one. Lord Jesus, I love You!
I'm in love with Jesus!
Lord I love You!! The most beautiful One!!
We're in love with Jesus!
O Lord, who or what can compare to You! O Lord Jesus! "To whom will you liken Me, that I should be compared? Says the Holy One." Is. 40:25
Lord Jesus, I love You!!

Oh Lord Jesus! Oh Lord Jesus! Oh Lord Jesus! Lord I Love You! Lord You are so worthy of our love. Because He poured His love into our hearts we can love Him back. We did not have any love to give Him. in fact we had nothing to give Him. But, because His love covers the multitude of sin, and He gave us His love, we can return some of this love to Him who paid the full price for us! JESUS! AMEN!

Lord, I fall in love with You! Set me as a seal on your heart, As a seal on your arm; For love is as strong as death! Lord Jesus, many waters cannot quench our love, Nor do floods drown it! Lord I love You!
Lord, keep attracting us and drawing us! You are the most beautiful One!
This morning I woke up in love. With the most Beautiful One!

I'm so attracted, I'm so attracted by Your love!! Thank You, Lord, for Your sweet love!! Thank You, Lord that You want such an intimate relationship with You. As You love me, I want to love You, dear Lord.
I'm in love... Lord with You!!
i like this hymn because i'm so attracted by the love of the Lord ...

"Let Him kiss me with the kisses...For Your love is better than wine" (S. of S. 1:2). "Draw me; we will run after You ..." (S. of S. 1:4a). "You whom my soul loves..." (S. of S.1:7a). May this most beautiful, affectionate, and intimate One continue to constrain us with His love, to run after Him. I'm in love!
Beautiful.
Lord Jesus I'm so attracted by Your love, so cause me to love You. In return I pursue You, Your full satisfaction. I'm in love with the most beautiful One. I love You, Lord Jesus.

I really appreciate this hymn because it reminds me of how sweet, personal, and intimate the Lord wants our relationship with Him to be. When we are unsatisfied, it is simply because we have lost our first love for the Lord. Praise the Lord that He is continually drawing us to Him, as the most beautiful, most affectionate One!
Amen! God is really attractive to those who loves Him! Praise the Lord that our God is so attractive. He draws us day by day unto Him!
I like this song because even though we are sinners but the Lord has captivated us by His love. Amen.

I am in love! I'm captivated! I'm charmed by this beautiful one!
Sometimes, I'll be so deeply in my spirit I will open my eyes for a moment because I know that I really probably should get going. I look around, and see nothing! Nothing at all! I close my eyes again and keep calling on the Lord; my everything! I am only 11 years old but already in a deep love with Christ. Hallelujah!

I'm so in love with this ONE! He is so attractive to me. My heart melted at this reading and when I heard it I was moved deeply In my Spirit. Now every time I reach my guitar I'm soooo in love with Him. He and I enter our private chamber and He nourishes me so tenderly. I pray all will enjoy the Lord in this hymn and find Him as the truly loving one and fall sooo deeply in Love with Jesus as I have.

I am so attracted by His love. His love and beauty has conquered me! Praise the Lord! Just taste and see that the Lord is good! Whatever You ask, ask in faith and remember 2 Tim. 1:7! Amen Lord, build Your church, quickly come!
